name: Boss Stickman
description:
Welcome to Boss Stickman. Leave all fears behind stickman fighting & battle, become the supreme in stickman warrior games. Show your stickman fighting skill and kill all the enemy, take revenge, defeat bad stick figure contained by the ultimate fighting games stick hero. It’s time to enjoy the stickman fighting games and stickman battle games.

Players may select their Stickman Super Heroes, who they love most, upgrade their ultimate power as much as possible, compete in the tournament of all maps, and rise to the top of the global standings.
Stickman will return fighting a stickman battle games, realistic lethal fighting with skills, new stick man fighting games. Get ready, wipe out enemies & their obstacles having stickman warrior games.

Boss Stickman - Stickman Fighting Games Features:

Single-player mode: Engage in infinite fights against various opponents across several maps.
Versus mode: The game will be more enjoyable with two players. Even you may play with a friend while simply utilizing one device.
Tournament mode: The best group of players will compete in a tournament to determine the last winner.
Simple control with a single joystick - Select the level of play mode: easy, normal, hard & super hard.
A variety of weapons to pick from, such as a rifle, infinity glove, even ice cream...
Minimalistic visuals provide a delightful experience.
Many beautiful maps to experience and explore
Realistic stick man fight ragdoll fight skills as warrior stick man fighting games - battling games

HOW TO PLAY

All you have to do is drag and drop your weapon to move about, then shoot, fire, or hurl it to eliminate the enemy.
Winning combat earns you coins, which you may use to unlock more and more skills & weapons for your Stickman Hero.
Be careful! If your Stickman falls into the water, you will be sent to the "game over" screen, returned to the home screen, and the level will be restarted from the beginning.
Boss Stickman is a fun and addictive game with realistic physics in the stickman fighting games stickman fighting games with weapons and arena stickman fighting games. Simple controls can perform amazing supreme characters to defeat your opponent.

Download Boss Stickman right now to enjoy the finest shadow fight of stick man!
